### **Basic information**

Hello everyone, my name is Weifan Wu. I am currently a third-year Ph.D. student in food science and technology. My focus is about antimicrobial activity of pomegranate against common foodborne pathogens.

### **Statistical experience**

I was first exposed to statistics due to the requirement of program of study, however, I have gradually developed deep interest in statistical analysis, especially when it's applied to data in public health area. The statistics courses I have taken include experimental design, applied data analysis using SPSS, spatial epidemiology. Therefore, I have knowledge of statistics and some experience with data analysis using softwares such as R, SPSS, SAS.
